sources.title: Beyond the Time Barrier (1960)
sources.description: "Beyond the Time Barrier" is a 1960 science fiction film directed by Edgar G. Ulmer, featuring a test pilot who accidentally travels to the year 2024, where he discovers a dystopian world affected by a cosmic plague. The film explores themes of time travel and survival in a post-apocalyptic setting.

sources.title: Beyond the Time Barrier 1960 colorized (Robert Clarke)
sources.description: In 1960, a military test pilot (Robert Clarke) is caught in a time warp that propels him to year 2024, where he finds a plague has sterilized most of the world's population. Robert Clarke as Maj. William Allison Darlene Tompkins as Princess Trirene Arianne Ulmer as Capt. Markova Vladimir Sokoloff as The Supreme Stephen Bekassy as Gen. Karl Kruse John Van Dreelen as Dr. Bourman I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday. For questions or general comments, please use the Colorized Movies Forum at https://archive.org/details/colorized-movies?tab=forum

metadata.Plot: Experimental pilot testing a new rocket powered craft (actually a Convair F-102 interceptor) manages to fly into the future and land at the now deserted airbase he left. He ends up in a city with people who are suspicious he is a spy and who want to keep him to procreate with the rulers daughter because the majority of the inhabitants are sterile. He manages to escape and return to his own time but "with consequences".
metadata.Actors: Robert Clarke, Darlene Tompkins, Arianne Ulmer
